F10.SI.summary: F J Benjamin Holdings Ltd, an investment holding company, engages in the brand building and management, and development of retail and distribution networks for international luxury and lifestyle brands in Southeast Asia. The company operates through three segments: Ongoing Retail, Distribution, and Export. It is involved in the import, export, licensing, distribution, and retail of consumer fashion wear and accessories, as well as home furnishings and timepieces. The company offers its luxury and lifestyle products under the Babyzen, Guess, La Senza, Marc Jacobs, Petunia Pickle Bottom, Pretty Ballerinas, Rebecca Minkoff, Sheridan, Superdry, U.S. Polo, and VNC. It also distributes timepieces under the Alpina, Baume & Mercier, Casio, FrÃ©dÃ©rique Constant, Gc, Guess, Nautica, Watchzone, and Victorinox Swiss Army brands. As of June 30, 2020, the company operated 169 stores, including 14 stores in Singapore, 53 stores in Malaysia, and 102 stores in Indonesia. F J Benjamin Holdings Ltd was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Singapore.

O08.SI.summary: Ossia International Limited, an investment holding company, imports, distributes, and retails apparel, sporting goods, footwear, accessories, bags, and golf products in the Asia Pacific region. It serves customers through a network of approximately 1,300 channels/outlets. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Singapore.
